summary: After being turned down to work at a hair salon because of her figure, a financially struggling hair dresser works to open her own shop.
cast: Gabriela Maria Schmeide|Natascha Lawiszus|Ill-Young Kim|Christina Große|Rolf Zacher|Maria Happel|Maren Kroymann|Tobias Lehmann|Heiko Pinkowski|Katharina Derr|Ulla Geiger|Dorothea Walda|Matthias Freihof|Pierre Sanoussi-Bliss|Jördis Triebel|Ewald F. Grunzke|Hansjürgen Hürrig|Yvonne Yung Hee Bormann|Hannes Stelzer|Josip Culjak|Mackie Heilmann|Regine Hentschel|Katja Marie Luxembourg|Natascha Petz|Christine Schmidt-Schaller|Nicoline Schubert
title: Die Friseuse
